doc.field: Flatlands Neck Sabbath School Society building contract and receipt
Flatlands Neck Sabbath School Society building contract and receipt

This collection consists of a contract to construct a building for the Flatlands Neck Sabbath School Society in the town of Flatlands in Kings County, and a receipt from the New York Secretary of State's office indicating that the Society's certificate of incorporation has been filed. Both items date from 1868.
